text: Suharno (1 October 1959 â€“ 19 August 2015) was an Indonesian football coach. He has managed Arema Cronus since November 2013. He played 12 years as a footballer. He began his career in PS Banteng and is due to retire after three seasons playing for Niac Mitra. He began his coaching career in 1988 as player-assistant coach at Niac Mitra. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Indonesian footballers Category:Football managers
title: Suharno (footballer)
